summary: This new code file, server.js, adds functionality to the system by allowing the server to handle requests to update movie ratings. It introduces a data structure to store movie ratings and related information, such as the number of ratings, average rating, and percentage. The file also includes logic to calculate and update these values based on incoming rating data. Additionally, it defines a POST endpoint '/update-rating' to receive and process rating updates, sending a response back with the updated rating information. This file plays a crucial role in managing and updating movie ratings within the system.
